channel.title: Hugos on My Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Hugos on My Wiki

item.title: Hugo
item.description: 一个静态网站生成器。 安装 go get -u -v github.com/kardianos/govendor govendor get -v github.com/spf13/hugo cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/spf13/hugo && go install 初始化工程 hugo new site ${project-name} 编辑 cd ${project-name} # 添加主题 git clone https://github.com/digitalcraftsman/hugo-material-docs.git themes/hugo-material-docs # 添加内容 hugo new <SECTIONNAME>/<FILENAME>.<FORMAT> 测试 cd ${project-name} hugo server
